responses.rationale: Describes officials providing an update, which is a response measure, without active reassurance.
Describes facts about cases and location, not capability or preparedness.
Describes evidence/hypothesis about transmission, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a fact noted by officials, not capability or preparedness.
Describes facts noted by officials, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a fact noted by officials, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a possibility/hypothesis, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a hypothesis, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a hypothesis that 'needs and requires a full investigation', a response measure, without reassurance.
Describes a hypothesis that 'needs and requires a full investigation', a response measure, without reassurance.
Describes the severity of cases, not capability or preparedness.
Describes symptoms, not capability or preparedness.
Describes challenges authorities face in 'seeking to prevent spread', a response measure, without reassurance.
Describes workers 'are meant to wear full PPE', an implemented safeguard, without reassurance.
Describes workers 'are meant to wear full PPE', an implemented safeguard, without reassurance.
Describes a problem affecting safeguards, not a capability statement itself.
Describes a condition/risk factor, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a method used, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a problem/challenge, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a 'pathway to prevention' and possibility 'possibly able to avoid future cases', a hopeful possibility, without reassurance.
Describes chickens 'are being slaughtered... to help limit the spread', a response measure, without reassurance.
Describes chickens 'will be slaughtered to help limit the spread', a response measure/safeguard, without reassurance.
Describes birds 'killed this year to help control the spread', a response measure/safeguard, without reassurance.
Describes birds 'killed this year to help control the spread', a response measure/safeguard, without reassurance.
Describes a characteristic of farms, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a fact about the state and impact, not capability or preparedness.
Describes confirmed cases, not capability or preparedness.
Describes confirmed cases and birds killed as part of the impact, not capability.
Describes past actions/impact, not capability.
Describes how the virus spreads, not capability or preparedness.
Describes actions farmers 'are working hard to keep the virus from infecting', implemented safeguards, without reassurance.
Describes a challenge/difficulty, not capability or preparedness.
Describes 'Properly cooking poultry and eggs... will also kill any viruses', a safeguard, without reassurance.
Describes 'Preventing seasonal influenza... may also reduce the risk', a hopeful future possibility, without reassurance.
Describes a risk/possibility, not capability or preparedness.
Describes 'we want to take steps now to reduce that effect', a planned response/safeguard, without reassurance.
Describes 'Anything that is predictable is also something that's preventable', a statement about possibility/capability, without reassurance.
Describes a past event, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a past event/theory, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a past event/theory, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a past event and a concern, not capability or preparedness.
Describes 'Anything we can do to reduce the likelihood', a statement about potential action/capability, without reassurance.
Describes a policy related to an initiative, a response measure, without reassurance.
Describes officials 'will bring vaccines', a planned response measure, without reassurance.
Describes the nature of an initiative, not capability or preparedness.
Describes a limitation of a measure, not capability or preparedness.
Describes CDC's assessment/policy 'does not think a specific bird flu vaccine is necessary', a preparedness statement, without reassurance.
Describes funding 'will be sent... to help prevent', a response measure/safeguard, without reassurance.
Describes how money 'will use the money to partner', a planned response measure, without reassurance.
Describes organizations 'will provide training' and 'will expand access', response measures/safeguards, without reassurance.
Describes confirmed cases, not capability or preparedness.
Describes past events/context, not capability or preparedness.
